One for all

It's Awesome

With Bootstrap 3, Syndicate is mobile friendly from the start. Instead of adding on optional mobile styles, they're baked right into the core. In fact, Syndicate is mobile first.

Made for Everyone

Packed with Features

Global CSS settings, fundamental HTML elements styled and enhanced with extensible classes and an advanced grid system.

More

Tons of Components

Add any, fast and easy

Dozens of reusable components built to provide dropdowns, navigation, alerts, popovers and much more.

Slide on Touch

We have added swipe function to Bootstrap carousel. It can be any width, depends of the layout that you want. This one is 1/2 width. You can find full width slider in header of section.

Easy to Customize

Syndicate includes a responsive, mobile-first fluid grid system that appropriately scales up to 12 columns as the device or viewport size increases.

361 Icons

Infinite scalability - scalable vector graphics means every icon looks awesome at any size.

Colorful or flat

Easily style icon color, size, shadows, use premade one or make your own color combo.

Rearrange layout

The place to stay when you want it your way. Move pages up and down and arrange elements.

Google fonts

We have used only Google web fonts. You can use any within a minute.

Responsive Videos

Embed YouTube and Vimeo videos on site and watch them on any device. Just wrap iframe of video in div with appropriate class and you are set.
